job.title: DevOps Engineer
job.description: Local Candidates Only •	7+ years’ experience in Site Reliability Engineering, DevOps, or Software Engineering roles. •	10+ years’ experience in Site Reliability Engineering, DevOps, or Software Engineering roles. •	4+ years’ experience developing in Golang, Python, or other programming languages. •	2+ years’ experience in IaC tools and languages such as Terraform, Ansible, Packer, or Helm. •	2+ years’ experience with cloud providers (preferably AWS). •	Ability to prioritize, communicate well, design for repeatability and scalability, exude ownership, and dig beneath the hood with technology.
